channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Community Financial System CEO defends rich valuation and eyes more deals
item.description: Chief executive of the KBW Regional Bank Index component defends his company’s premium valuation based on a higher proportion of net interest income.

item.title: The Two Big Insurers Still Betting on Fossil Fuels
item.description: Most companies have cut back on oil, gas and coal investments after big climate-related losses. But State Farm and Berkshire Hathaway’s insurance comp...

item.title: When Will Money-Market Funds Lose Their Allure?
item.description: Cash has been one of the hottest investments since 2020. Now, some investors are weighing when to get out.

item.title: Another reason Qualcomm shouldn’t buy Intel? Its bonds could reach junk status.
item.description: GimmeCredit started coverage of Qualcomm’s bonds Wednesday with a bearish rating.

item.title: China Market Support May Fizzle Out If Key Issues Remain Unsolved
item.description: China’s push to bolster its stock markets has stirred optimism, but begs the question of whether investors will take the bait amid lingering doubts ab...

item.title: Investors are finally experiencing the ‘everything’ bull market — and it may last, this strategist says
item.description: Jim Paulsen says a broad-based rally can now take place because the Fed cut interest rates.

item.title: Hong Kong stocks lead global surge on reports of more China stimulus measures
item.description: Hong Kong’s equity market hit a one-year high and led a surge in global stocks as the China-stimulus-induced risk-asset rally received further propuls...

item.title: How Hello Kitty Took Over the World
item.description: Investors in Sanrio have made 10 times their money as the iconic Japanese brand expands digitally.

item.title: Oil prices slump after report Saudi Arabia to scrap price target, boost output
item.description: Oil futures fell Thursday morning, feeling pressure after the Financial Times reported that Saudi Arabia was ready to abandon its $100-a-barrel price ...

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg's AI Vision Makes Metaverse a Slightly Easier Sell
item.description: Meta’s latest AI tools and headsets could prove to be an edge in consumer adoption and keep investors on board with massive spending.
